output_list.reason: The mintToken function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the balanceOf the target address, allowing the owner to set the balance of any user to any value, thus locking funds.
The mine function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the balanceOf the target address, allowing the owner to set the balance of any user to any value, thus locking funds.
The transferFrom function does not check if the contract has enough balance to transfer, allowing a contract to transfer funds to any address, causing a denial of service.
The approve function does not check if the spender is a contract, allowing a contract to call approve and transferFrom in a way that steals funds.
The transfer function does not check if the target is a contract, allowing a contract to call transfer and steal funds.
